title: Whitsundays & Great Barrier Reef Private Catamaran Charter for up to 8 Guests
description:
Set sail amid the spectacular beauty of the Whitsundays and Great Barrier Reef onboard the cruising catamaran Southern Man, with Anchor Charters’ bareboat private sailing experience. Exclusively for your group of up to eight, Southern Man boasts four double cabins, each featuring a private ensuite. There’s no dreamier way to explore the Whitsundays' crystal-clear waters - with no set itinerary and 74 extraordinary emerald islands on the horizon, you’re free to snorkel and splash among whales, dolphins, turtles and tropical fish at your own pace.

Sail in style - Southern Man comes complete with a Nespresso machine, kitchenette, deckchairs, a stern-mounted BBQ, private dinghy and more. Plus, thanks to an included full maritime briefing, this is an adventure even novices can sail towards. With exclusive Ocean Club access prior to boarding the vessel with use of luxury bathroom and BBQ facilities, you’ll be all set for the escape of a lifetime.
offer_address: Coral Sea Marina, Shingley Drive, Airlie Beach 4802, Queensland Australia

title: Airlie Beach Self-Contained Apartment Paradise near the Whitsundays with Daily Breakfast & Nightly Drinks
description:
Be perfectly positioned at the gateway to the wonders of the Whitsundays and the Great Barrier Reef when you stay at Club Wyndham Airlie Beach, where apartment living and resort paradise meet. Your stylish, self-contained apartment offers both comfort and privacy, while the rest of the resort has everything else you might need for a memorable escape. Head to Tides at Airlie Beach for a culinary venture into modern Australian cuisine infused with Asian influences, along with stunning views of the nearby harbour. Take a dip in the refreshing outdoor swimming pool or lay back on a sunlounger and enjoy a cocktail or two. When you’re ready to work up a sweat, the fitness centre has all the equipment you need to enjoy a good workout.

For a day in the sun, take a leisurely 20-minute stroll to Boathaven Beach and roll out a towel on the soft, white sand or enjoy a paddle in the crystal-clear waters. Later, head out and explore the best of the Whitsundays, such as the famous Whitehaven Beach, Hamilton Island and Whitsunday Islands National Park. When you’ve had your fill of sun and sand, relax in the comfort of your apartment, taking a nap on the plush bedding or whipping up a home-cooked meal in the fully equipped kitchen.
offer_address: 9A Hermitage Drive, Airlie Beach, Queensland 4802, Australia

title: Bestselling Whitsundays Private Sailing Charter for 6 Guests with Early Boarding & Ocean Club Access Plus Upgrades for 8 Guests
description:
Be the captain of your adventure on this incredible voyage through the majestic Whitsundays with a once-in-a-lifetime opportunity to charter a vessel through acclaimed eco-tour agency Portland Roads - Sailing the Whitsundays. It's the ultimate group escape: set sail on the catamaran Due West for up to six guests, or upgrade to Ruby Sunday, Lucy, Portland Roads or Whitsunday Freedom for up to eight. Glide through sapphire waters in the heart of the UNESCO World Heritage-listed Great Barrier Reef, stroll barefoot across the warm, white sands of untouched islands and delve into the coral-filled paradise shimmering beneath the Whitsundays' waves: Portland Roads - Sailing the Whitsundays will take you wherever you need to be.

After a day spent exploring any of the region's 74 emerald islands, retreat in style to your spacious premium luxury catamaran and savour each magnificent sunset as you sit back and dine by the waterfront in either your outdoor or indoor dining setting. Featuring a full maritime briefing, this six-day, five-night sailing adventure (with one bonus evening moored at the marina) is suitable for all, with no prior experience required. If it's always been your dream to sail through one of the Seven Natural Wonders of the World, now's the perfect chance.
offer_address: Coral Sea Marina - Shingley Drive, Airlie Beach, Queensland 4802, Australia

title: Unique Beachfront Whitsundays Escape with Daily Sunset Cocktails
description: If you are a lover of all things unique - and nautical - you will absolutely love Freedom Shores Resort, located right by the water on the outskirts of Airlie Beach and boasting spectacular views over the Coral Sea. Go beyond just a maritime picture in the lobby and fully embrace the unique architectural style of this resort, where you can sleep in a replica of a fishing boat with the added luxury of ultra-modern comforts. Your one-of-a-kind escape includes daily continental breakfast, daily sunset drinks - your choice of a hand-crafted cocktail, craft beer or glass of premium wine - a welcome glass of sparkling wine each and one A$50 dining and drinks credit for lunch or dinner at the award-winning onsite Northerlies Beach Bar & Grill.
offer_address: Lot 103 Pringle Rd, Woodwark QLD 4802

title: Newly Renovated Whitsundays Escape near Airlie Beach with Daily Breakfast, Nightly Drinks & A$25 Daily Dining Credit
description:
Retreat to the balmy tropics of the Whitsundays with a stay at this charming retreat, just a five-minute drive from Airlie Beach. Perfect for peaceful days exploring the area’s best beaches and bays - or days of rest before jetting to the nearby islands of the Whitsundays - Mantra Club Croc Airlie Beach offers one of the region’s finest laidback escapes.

After substantial renovations, this coastal escape offers a shimmering lagoon-style pool, lush garden and brand-new amenities. With a daily A$25 dining credit included, lap up the warm weather while dining on locally sourced seafood at the breezy Club Croc Bistro or enjoying ice-cold cocktails by the pool.

Explore the vibrant Airlie Beach Lagoon and the town’s bustling Saturday markets, or head to the nearby marina to set sail to the Great Barrier Reef.
offer_address: 240 Shute Harbour Road, Cannonvale, Queensland 4802, Australia

title: It's Back: Whitsundays Private Sailing Charter for up to 8 Guests with Luxury Skippered Upgrades Available
description:
Be the captain of your own adventure on this incredible bareboat voyage through the majestic beauty of the Whitsundays. Back by popular demand, this is a once-in-a-lifetime opportunity to charter your own vessel - or upgrade to holiday like royalty, with a private skipper to guide you onboard the brand-new Whistunday Freedom catamaran.

With luxury catamarans for up to eight guests available (or six guests on skippered charters), split the cost of this unbelievable experience with family and friends. Glide through crystal-clear waters in the heart of the UNESCO World Heritage-listed Great Barrier Reef, stroll barefoot across the velvety white sands of untouched islands and delve into the snorkelers' paradise shimmering beneath the Whitsundays' waves.

Featuring a full maritime briefing, this six-night sailing adventure is suitable for all, with no prior experience required.

**Your handpicked inclusions:**

- Spend six full days onboard your choice of luxury catamaran
- Enjoy early boarding at 5pm on the day of arrival with an overnight stay onboard the catamaran in the Coral Sea Marina (six nights onboard total)
- With your early boarding, enjoy access to Ocean Club, with private ensuites and an outdoor lounge space for marina guests
- Benefit from a full maritime briefing (4-5 hours) to learn the secrets of navigating the Whitsundays

**Private Skipper Upgrade:** Holiday like the rich and famous with the guidance of an experienced skipper, who will help you unearth the secrets of the Whitsundays. Set sail on the brand-new Whitsunday Freedom, an extraordinary Lagoon 450S sailing catamaran with spacious double cabins, each with private ensuite. A personal skipper, aboard a luxury catamaran for up to six friends, sailing through the natural beauty of the Whitsundays: this is the ultimate sailing escape. **Please note:** The Whitsunday Freedom Skipper Upgrade can accommodate six guests across three cabins, with a fourth cabin reserved for your skipper.

**This deal has NO surcharges:** Sail any time, including school holidays, for the same great price!
offer_address: Coral Sea Marina - Shingley Drive Airlie Beach Qld 4802

description:

title: Iconic Daydream Island in the Heart of the Whitsundays & Great Barrier Reef with Room Upgrade, A$100 Credit & Daily Breakfast
description:
Experience the magic of the Whitsundays with a stay at the impressive Daydream Island Resort - an iconic family-friendly escape at the gateway to the UNESCO World Heritage-listed Great Barrier Reef. Just five kilometres off the coast of the mainland and surrounded by lush rainforest with a fringe of cool coastline, this resort is only accessible by boat or helicopter. With three restaurants, a revitalised pool area and a manmade free-form coral lagoon wrapping 200m around the central building, this is one of the best ways to enjoy this stunning part of Queensland, the Great Barrier Reef and surrounding islands.

A stay on Daydream Island truly feels like an escape from the world, surrounded by one of the seven wonders of the world. From snorkelling to scuba diving and glass bottom boats, there are many ways to enjoy this natural beauty, teeming with colourful marine life. As one of 74 islands in the Whitsundays, Daydream is also the perfect launchpad for a boating adventure on these crystal-clear waters. Sunbathe on the impossibly white sands of Whitehaven Beach, hike through dense rainforest and take in this breathtaking area of unspoiled beauty.

Expert Tip: While Daydream Island is a tropical paradise and one of the most popular family destinations in Australians, please note it isn’t a ‘luxury resort’.
offer_address: Daydream Island Whitsundays QLD 4802 Australia
